Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Kent was gone for long periods of time when Sam was young. Without this community, I'm not sure how I could have raised him.
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: Sometimes I feel like all I do is cook and clean.$s
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: Sam left the laundry in the washer the other day, and it started smelling of mildew.$s#$b#As much as I love my boys, I wonder if I babied them too much...
Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: I found an interesting recipe in last week's edition of Homemaker's Weekly, but I'm not sure it's something I can get Vincent to eat.
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, @, sometimes I wish I could just serve leftovers sometimes.#$b#I feel like I spend all my time cooking and cleaning.
Entries.13{{YearRemainder}}: So, @, why did you decide to move to such a small town?
Entries.14{{YearRemainder}}: Ugh, I really don't feel like cooking dinner tonight.#$b#And the dishes, I'll probably end up doing the dishes too.$s
Entries.15{{YearRemainder}}: I wish I could get the boys to eat veggies more often...

Entries.2_2: I started knitting a scarf. Emily thought it'd be a good idea.#$b#I'm not very good, though.
Entries.3_2: Vincent isn't doing particularly well in his classes.#$b#He's still very young though, it's more important he has fun at his age.
Entries.6_2: I'm so glad Kent is back with us.
Entries.Resort_Approach_HouseWives: @, Caroline and I are off to the island today! You want to come with?$h

Entries.winter_Sun10: Kent's been back for about a year now...#$b#I think he's...slowly getting better.

Entries.winter_Fri10: It's almost Winter Star. Kent's first Winter Star back.#$b#It's...bittersweet.$s

Entries.2_2: Ugh, Kent's pension doesn't go nearly as far as it used to.$s
Entries.7_2: I'd like to get some new houseplants, but online shipping is so much more expensive than it was this time last year.$s
Entries.8_2: Why are eggs suddenly so much more expensive...#$b#Say, @, you're not getting paid any more for your eggs, right? Who's taking the extra money, then?$a
Entries.22_2: There are so many chores I need to do...$s#$b#It's like chores never end...
